scripts.build: yarn install && lerna bootstrap && lerna run build --sort
scripts.depgraph: scripts/depgraph && git add assets/deps.png && git commit -m 'docs: update dep graph' && git push
scripts.examples: ex="examples/*"; for e in $ex; do (cd $e && yarn build); done
scripts.pub: lerna publish && yarn depgraph && yarn doc && scripts/upload-docs
